hopobject.name: wifiradio1
hopobject.body: Starting from an existing simple alarm clock FM radio, scavenge the hardware (casing, clock display, button, perhaps power supply) and implement a wifi radio, keeping the feature of the clock with alarm, but replacing the FM radio with wifi radio, adding a little LCD to display station and user option and a rotary for station selection. Idea is to keep the product as a simple bedside device (alarm clock) and not a mini-color tv full-blown computer next to the bed.
hopobject.shortdesc: Offer clock, alarm, snooze, wifi connection, wifi radio, and radio station playlist. Possibly integrating podcast as well.
